TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnonymousPipeServerStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousPipeServerStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class AnonymousPipeServerStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: 公开匿名管道周围的流，该管道既支持同步读写操作，也支持异步读写操作。

span.span: Exposes a stream around an anonymous pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 匿名管道有助于在子进程和父进程之间提供安全的进程间通信。Anonymous pipes help provide safe and secure interprocess communication between child and parent processes. 使用 类，可以使用父进程从子进程发送或接收信息。The class enables a parent process to send or receive information from a child process. 匿名管道是指通常在父进程和子进程之间传输数据的单向管道。Anonymous pipes are unnamed, one-way pipes that typically transfer data between parent and child processes. 匿名管道始终是本地的;它们不能通过网络使用。Anonymous pipes are always local; they cannot be used over a network. 不支持 值，因为匿名管道定义为单向。A value of is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way. 匿名管道不支持 读取模式。Anonymous pipes do not support the read mode. 必须通过调用 方法，从服务器端提供的管道句柄创建匿名管道的客户端。The client side of an anonymous pipe must be created from a pipe handle provided by the server side by calling the method. 然后，在创建客户端进程时将该字符串作为参数传递。The string is then passed as a parameter when creating the client process. 然后，将该客户端进程作为 `pipeHandleAsString` 参数传递给 构造函数。From the client process, it is then passed to the constructor as the `pipeHandleAsString` parameter. 对象必须使用 方法释放客户端句柄，以便在客户端退出时获得通知。The object must dispose the client handle using the method in order to be notified when the client exits. ## Examples 下面的示例使用匿名管道将一个字符串从父进程发送到子进程。The following example sends a string from a parent process to a child process using anonymous pipes. 此示例在父进程中创建 对象，它的 值为 。This example creates an object in a parent process with a value of . 它还在 值为 的子进程中创建 对象。It also creates an object in a child process with a value of . 接下来，父进程将用户提供的字符串发送给子进程。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 此字符串将显示在控制台中。The string is displayed to the console. 此示例适用于使用 类的服务器进程。This example is for the server process, which uses the class. 有关完整的代码示例（包括管道客户端和服务器的代码），请参阅[如何：使用匿名管道进行本地进程间通信](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code example, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Anonymous Pipes for Local Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample/cpp/program.cpp)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample/cs/Program.cs)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample/vb/program.vb)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的安全句柄，当前该对象连接到 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将客户端句柄传递到客户端进程后，应调用 方法。The method should be called after a client handle has been passed to a client process. 如果未调用此方法，则当客户端释放其 对象时， 对象将不会收到通知。If this method is not called, the object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its object.

span.span: Closes the local copy of the object's handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在客户端句柄被传递到客户端之后，应调用 方法。The method should be called after the client handle has been passed to the client. 如果未调用此方法，则当客户端释放其 对象时， 对象将不会收到通知。If this method is not called, the object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用匿名管道将字符串从父进程发送到子进程。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process by using anonymous pipes. 在此示例中，将在具有 值 的父进程中创建一个 对象。In this example, an object is created in a parent process with a value of . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetClientHandleAsString() cil managed

summary.span: 以字符串形式获取已连接的 对象的句柄。

span.span: Gets the connected object's handle as a string.

returns.span: 一个表示已连接的 对象的句柄的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the connected object's handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将客户端句柄传递到客户端进程后，应调用 方法。The method should be called after a client handle has been passed to a client process. 如果未调用此方法，则当客户端释放其 对象时， 对象将不会收到通知。If this method is not called, the object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用匿名管道将字符串从父进程发送到子进程。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process by using anonymous pipes. 在此示例中，将在具有 值 的父进程中创建一个 对象。In this example, an object is created in a parent process with a value of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 匿名管道不支持 读取模式。Anonymous pipes do not support the read mode. 由于此属性的默认值为 ，因此永远不需要在代码中设置此属性。Because the default value of this property is , there is never a reason to set this property in your code.

span.span: The transmission mode is not valid.
